snippet: The husband of a woman stoned to death in Pakistan killed his first wife four years ago, police and relatives said Thursday, a shocking twist both showing how complicated justice can be and how dangerous life is for women in the country....

headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Slain Woman's Husband Killed 1st Wife
headline.main: Pakistan: Slain Woman's Husband Killed 1st Wife

lead_paragraph: The husband of a woman stoned to death in Pakistan killed his first wife four years ago, police and relatives said Thursday, a shocking twist both showing how complicated justice can be and how dangerous life is for women in the country.
